item.title: Dark and Darker Mobile title changed to Abyss of Dungeons
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/dark-and-darker-mobile-title-changed-to-abyss-of-dungeons

  • Smartphone

Welcome to the new Abyss.

Publisher KRAFTON and developer Bluehole Studio have changed the title of free-to-play dark fantasy extraction RPG Dark and Darker Mobile to Abyss of Dungeons, the companies announced.

“Dark and Darker Mobile has evolved into Abyss of Dungeons,” the companies said. “This change reflects our vision to take dungeon crawling even deeper—with darker atmospheres, richer lore, and more intense battles. The game remains the same at its core. Your journey continues. Just under a new name.”

Abyss of Dungeons is currently in soft launch for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play and Galaxy Store in the United States and Canada.

Watch a new trailer below.

New Title Announce Trailer

English

Japanese

Korean

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy – Switch 2 ‘Gameplay’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/hogwarts-legacy-switch-2-gameplay-trailer

  • Switch 2

A look at the visual improvements over the Switch version.

Publisher Warner Bros. Games and Portkey Games, and developers Avalanche Software and Krome Studios have released a gameplay trailer for the Switch 2 version of open-world action RPG Hogwarts Legacy, which is due out alongside the console on June 5.

Pre-orders for the game are also now available in teh following editions:

  • Physical Standard Edition ($59.99)
  • Digital Standard Edition ($59.99)
    • The digital edition of Hogwarts Legacy for Switch 2 is available at a discount to players who already own the digital or physical Switch edition. Players who own the physical edition of Hogwarts Legacy on Switch will need to download [Activate Hogwarts Legacy Owner’s Discount on Nintendo Switch 2] in-game to see the available discount on Nintendo eShop.
  • Digital Deluxe Edition ($69.99)

Here is an overview of the game, via Warner Bros. Games:

Published by Warner Bros. Games under the Portkey Games label and developed by Avalanche Software, Hogwarts Legacy is an immersive, action, open-world role-playing-game set in the 1800s wizarding world. Beginning as a fifth year, players will embark on a journey through new and familiar locations, explore and discover magical beasts, craft potions, master spell casting, upgrade talents and customize their character to become the witch or wizard they want to be.

Players can experience Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry with Hogwarts Legacy for Nintendo Switch 2, which has been updated with Joy-Con 2 mouse controls and improved graphics, audio, load times, and controls for Nintendo Switch 2. The Nintendo Switch 2 version of Hogwarts Legacy is being co-developed by Avalanche Software and Krome Studios.

Hogwarts Legacy is currently available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

Watch the trailer below.

Switch 2 Gameplay Trailer
